commit.message: Implemented data source selection and updated the HTML and KML modules to respond to these selections
Codacy fixes and small interface changes
Null fix and some clean up
Added yes-no dialog if there are zero data source selections

nodes.bodyText: How does making this getter public tie into the solution?
Is making this Serializable looking towards the future?
